channel.title: How do i make my server not automatically shutdown?
channel.description: cause my server shuts its self down after a while

item.title: How do i make my server not automatically shutdown?
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“O M G, post:11, topic:81852”]No hard feelings

I’ve had The Ultimate Server Guide 2 for a very long time, I wasn’t trying to leech, or spin off your tutorial…
I pretty much wrote that tutorial to be stickied, perhaps you could make V3 or V4
And it just seemed like you ripped that tut of runeserver because you deleted everything, if you had just said you posted it there I would have left it alone

Anyway I try to help everyone and have nothing against anyone here, so just ask if you need anything more :)[/quote]kk ty

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server not automatically shutdown?

item.title: How do i make my server not automatically shutdown?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

[quote=“sp00nkitty, post:9, topic:81852”][quote author=O M G link=topic=120279.msg1180589#msg1180589 date=1176980227]
Simple enough
[/quote]yup hehe and im sorry for having anything agaisnt u i only felt that way about u cause i posted my server guide and u said i ripped it from runeserver but that was actually me that posted it on there ages ago and i only just realised last week it has been really helpful so i posted it and then all of a sudden u got ur post added to mod taharok’s post which really got me angry so yer no harsh feelings now[/quote]
No hard feelings

I’ve had The Ultimate Server Guide 2 for a very long time, I wasn’t trying to leech, or spin off your tutorial…
I pretty much wrote that tutorial to be stickied, perhaps you could make V3 or V4
And it just seemed like you ripped that tut of runeserver because you deleted everything, if you had just said you posted it there I would have left it alone

Anyway I try to help everyone and have nothing against anyone here, so just ask if you need anything more

Read full topic
